name: 霍弘毅
objective: After a review of major texts and approaches from Plato, Aristotle, Aquinas and the Humanist tradition we will examine thinking from approximately the early to the late 20th century including (but not limited to) such figures as Georges Bataille, Julia Kristiva, Jacques Lacan, Luce Irigaray, Michel Foucault, and others depending on what students may be interested in.  I will be flexible in presenting issues of feminism, psychoanalysis, the notions of ‘expenditure’ and ‘abjection’, structuralism, post-structuralism and others.
